briefTitle: An Early Phase Study of Abraxane Combined With Phenelzine Sulfate in Patients With Metastatic or Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase Ib Safety and Pharmacokinetics (PK)/ Pharmacodynamics (PD) Study to Determine the Dosage of Abraxane in Combination With Phenelzine Sulfate in Metastatic or Inoperable Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
